titles.title: Prohibition Against Criminal Alien Reentry Act of 2007
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase criminal penalties for certain removed aliens who illegally reenter the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 7/24/2007--Introduced. Prohibition Against Criminal Alien Reentry Act of 2007 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase criminal penalties for certain removed aliens who illegally reenter the United States.
